channel.title: Warrior Guild Animated Armours & Armour Animator Object
channel.description:
I have recently obtained these models from a friend, who wants to stay Un-Named, And I have Added all the Server side shit, To make these Actually work fully. The models are the Models for the Animated Armour NPC's, and the armour Animator Object. I have added, into my server, that when you use A Fullhelm/PlateBody/Platelegs, of one kind on the animator, it brings the amrour to life, around 3-4 seconds after you have placed the armour, The armour shouts out "IM ALIVE!", and you May kill it for warrior Guild tokens I have also created, which can be spent In the Shop just west of the Animators, which sells items Like Rune defenders, Fighters Torsos, Penance armour, Including the Penance hats, Granite Body, etc.
The NPC's are aggressive, Only towards the Person who brought them to life, and no other person may attack your Armour NPC.
Pictures:
The NPC's & Object:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AnimatedArmours.jpg[/img]
The Shops (Sloane (Strength skillcape guy) is the Item Seller, from which you can spend your tokens on in that shop, and the Ghost shop keeper, sells armours up to Adamant, since Rune is rare on my server, and can only be obtained through smithing, Completing the Legends quest and Buying from Their shop, or Completing Some quests to gain 32 quest points to enter the Champions guild, to purchase rune there.).
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Shops.jpg[/img]
An Animated GIF:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/animarmour.gif[/img]
[b]Tell me If you like it or not, And what you think could be improved/Added to make this better.[/b]

@primadude wrote:

I have recently obtained these models from a friend, who wants to stay Un-Named, And I have Added all the Server side shit, To make these Actually work fully.
The models are the Models for the Animated Armour NPC’s, and the armour Animator Object. I have added, into my server, that when you use A Fullhelm/PlateBody/Platelegs, of one kind on the animator, it brings the amrour to life, around 3-4 seconds after you have placed the armour, The armour shouts out “IM ALIVE!”, and you May kill it for warrior Guild tokens I have also created, which can be spent In the Shop just west of the Animators, which sells items Like Rune defenders, Fighters Torsos, Penance armour, Including the Penance hats, Granite Body, etc.

The NPC’s are aggressive, Only towards the Person who brought them to life, and no other person may attack your Armour NPC.

Pictures:

The NPC’s & Object:

AnimatedArmours.jpg533×506

The Shops (Sloane (Strength skillcape guy) is the Item Seller, from which you can spend your tokens on in that shop, and the Ghost shop keeper, sells armours up to Adamant, since Rune is rare on my server, and can only be obtained through smithing, Completing the Legends quest and Buying from Their shop, or Completing Some quests to gain 32 quest points to enter the Champions guild, to purchase rune there.).

Tell me If you like it or not, And what you think could be improved/Added to make this better.
